name: Iphone Update
shortDesc: Discover excellence in mobile innovation with the Apple iPhone â€“ where style and performance unite
keyFeature: A15 Bionic chip, Super Retina XDR display, dual-camera system, iOS 15, 5G capable
desc: The Apple iPhone 13 is a masterpiece of mobile technology. It features a powerful A15 Bionic chip for lightning-fast performance, a stunning Super Retina XDR display, and a dual-camera system for capturing amazing photos and videos. With iOS 15, you get the latest features and updates. Plus, it's 5G capable for super-fast connectivity.

name: Air-Pod-Max
shortDesc: Elegance on your wrist. Our watches blend style and functionality effortlessly.
desc: AirPods Max redefine your audio experience with Active Noise Cancellation, delivering immersive sound. Enjoy Spatial Audio for a cinematic feel, seamless pairing with your Apple devices, and long-lasting battery life for all-day music and calls.
keyFeature: Active Noise Cancellation, Spatial Audio, seamless pairing, long battery life.

name: MacBook
shortDesc: Powerful productivity in a sleek package. Elevate your work and play.
desc: The MacBook Pro is the epitome of laptop excellence. It boasts a stunning Retina display for vibrant visuals, a powerful Intel or Apple Silicon chip for top-tier performance, macOS for a seamless user experience, and a sleek design that's both stylish and portable.
keyFeature: Retina display, powerful Intel/Apple Silicon chip, macOS, sleek design.

name: Apple Watch

keyFeature: AirPods Pro redefine your audio experience with Active Noise Cancellation, delivering immersive sound. Enjoy Spatial Audio for a cinematic feel, seamless pairing with your Apple devices, and long-lasting battery life for all-day music and calls.
desc: The Apple Watch Series 7 is the perfect blend of style and functionality. Its Always-On Retina display ensures you can see important information at a glance. name: OnePlus 7 Pro
shortDesc: OnePlus phones redefine speed and style. Cutting-edge performance with a touch of elegance.
desc: The OnePlus 7 Pro offers a remarkable display with its Fluid AMOLED screen and 90Hz refresh rate. It's powered by the Snapdragon 855 processor for exceptional performance. The triple-camera system captures stunning photos, and the pop-up front camera provides a seamless full-screen experience. OxygenOS ensures a clean and fast user interface.
keyFeature: Snapdragon 855 processor, Triple-camera system with a pop-up front camera, OxygenOS for a clean and fast user experience.

name: OnePlus 8 Pro
shortDesc: OnePlus phones redefine speed and style. Cutting-edge performance with a touch of elegance.
desc: The OnePlus 8 Pro impresses with its Fluid AMOLED display featuring a 120Hz refresh rate. It's powered by the Snapdragon 865 processor for top-notch performance. The quad-camera system, including a 48MP main camera, delivers exceptional photo quality. Plus, it supports Warp Charge 30T and Warp Wireless 30 for rapid charging.
keyFeature: Snapdragon 865 processor, Triple-camera system with a pop-up front camera, OxygenOS for a clean and fast user experience.

name: OnePlus 10 Pro
shortDesc: OnePlus phones redefine speed and style. Cutting-edge performance with a touch of elegance.

keyFeature: Snapdragon 865 processor, Triple-camera system with a pop-up front camera, OxygenOS for a clean and fast user experience.

name: OnePlus Smart Watch
shortDesc: Enhance your daily routine with OnePlus smartwatches. Where tech meets your wrist, seamlessly.
desc: The OnePlus Watch is a stylish and feature-rich smartwatch. It boasts a circular AMOLED display, making it easy to navigate through your notifications and apps. The watch offers comprehensive health monitoring, including SpO2 and heart rate tracking, as well as sleep tracking for a better understanding of your overall well-being. With up to 14 days of battery life, it's designed to keep up with your active lifestyle.
keyFeature: Always-On Retina display, fitness tracking, ECG, watchOS, stylish bands
